channel.title: How do I reduce lag
channel.description: Title says it all.. My server has a little bit of lagging.. how would I reduce this? It is not hosted on a vps yet until we get atleast 30 players so I want to reduce lag as much as I can.

item.title: How do I reduce lag
item.dc:creator: @bl00dpk bl00dpk
item.description:
@bl00dpk wrote:

^ That if its your computer but if everyone else is also having lagg try reducing the number of customs Items.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I reduce lag
item.dc:creator: @emo_skill emo skill
item.description:
@emo_skill wrote:

Try to close all other open applications on your hosting computer that you aren’t using. Also, you could try disabling the wifi on things that aren’t using it at the time to try to free up bandwidth.

Read full topic
